subject: Update Shipping Address to Prevent Return
description_text:
Dear Customer Service Team,



I am contacting you regarding an issue with my shipment (tracking number: 5P63D60093644). The package appears to be stuck in transit, and the tracking updates indicate it may be returned to the sender.



To prevent this, please urgently inform the courier that the correct delivery address is:

Via Alessandro Manzoni 20, 20091 Bresso (MI), Italy



It is essential that the shipment is not returned, as this would create a significant problem for me. I kindly ask you to update the address with the courier as soon as possible and ensure the delivery can proceed correctly.



Thank you for your prompt assistance.



Best regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Francesco. soldano002,    Please provide your order number and the platform where you made the purchase.

The platform is aliexpress and the number is
3062853145128192, i hope u can find a solution.


Il giorno gio 20 nov 2025 alle 04:11 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

> Hi Francesco. soldano002,
>
> Please provide your order number and the platform where you made the
> purchase.
